```{r, Datengenese, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
x <- sample(1:100, 6)
median <- median(x)
i <- sample(1:6,6)
library(dplyr)
library(exams)
data <- 
  tibble(
    answerlist = c(
      setdiff(x, median)[1],
      setdiff(x, median)[2],
      setdiff(x, median)[3],
      setdiff(x, median)[4],
      setdiff(x, median)[5],
      median
    ),
    exsolution = c(F,F,F,F,F,T)
  ) |> 
  sample_frac(1)
```
